Introduction

Kim Sunwoo, known under his stage name Sunoo, is a South Korean singer-songwriter, dancer, and composer under Belift Lab. He is best known as a member of the boy group ENHYPEN.

On June 1, 2020, Sunoo was introduced as a contestant in the CJ ENM and Big Hit Entertainment's reality survival show I-LAND. On September 18, 2020, he ranked as the 7th place and became a member of ENHYPEN.

Sunoo made his debut as a member of ENHYPEN on November 30, 2020, with their first mini album "Border : Day One".
